title: Silence On The Sidelines: An MLB Insider's 'Manifesto' On Youth Sports
teaser: Baseball's Mike Matheny speaks with Fresh Air's Dave Davies about his playing career, managing in the big leagues and the pressures of youth sports. Matheny is the author of The Matheny Manifesto.
